config.llamaParseApiKey.desc: Your LlamaCloud API Key for document parsing (required). [Get API Key](https://cloud.llamaindex.ai/api-key)
config.llmProvider.desc: Select the LLM provider for report generation (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini).
config.llmApiKey.desc: API Key for your selected LLM Provider.
config.customFormatFilePath.desc: Optional: Path to a custom format or prompt file to use during report generation.
config.outputFormat.desc: Select the output format (html, md) for the generated report.
